name: Kiwhy Do You Hate Me?
description:
STORY:

There was a time when the table cloth welcomed fruits from all over the world: yellow or brown, with or without peel, it didn’t matter... 

But one day everything changed: Wanda the watermelon, with her massive armor, started to discriminate the kiwis for their unusual look...

_____________________________________________________________________

GAME:

Play as Kawai De Kiwi, a lonely fruit who seeks revenge for his dead parents:

- Dodge the incoming attacks

- Beware melons and durians: they will help Wanda!

- Wanda is a tough one! You'll need to shoot at the crossbows in order to remove her hard rind

_____________________________________________________________________

CREDITS:

This game was made for The Opposing Game Jam (48 hours) with the themes devastation & rebuilding... thanks for your hard work guys!
